name: AR My First Calendar
description:
Augmented Reality technology may be new for some users. What is Augmented Reality?

Augmented Reality is a technology that brings the world around you and adds virtual element on top which looks like it's actually there in the real world. Augmented Reality (AR) is part of mixed reality lies between real world and virtual world, which brings elements of virtual world in to real world.

This app is marker based Augmented Reality which means you required printed marker to play this app. Please see instruction below or in information option in your app.

How to use:
• Download and print AR My First Calendar PDF marker from https://entstudioapps.com/downloads/
• Focus app camera on printed marker and see how 4D calendar comes to life.

My First Calendar is the first Augmented Reality based kids educational Calendar in market with lots of exciting features.

• Augmented Reality will amaze your kids how floating 3D calendar comes live from the printed marker.
• Every 3D and animated objects makes calendar live and features will keep your kid more interested to use this Calendar everyday.
• Kids will learn about Date, Month, Year, Day, Season, Weather, Temperature, Holidays, Activities and Emotions.
• Create separate kids profile for each kid with different avatars to choose from.
• The purpose of this app for kids to learn Calendar while interacting with 3D objects and having fun playing in Augmented Reality environment.
• Features allow them to understand and learn Calendar easy way.
• Available on all mobile platforms and compatible with all different screen size.
• Kid won’t get bored using this app as as My First Calendar has daily activity for learning kid.

Features:
• Horizontal carousel menu to scroll and select your choice
• Up to year 2025 provided
• 28 x 3D animated holidays for USA, Canada, UK and Australia
• 4 x 3D animated season
• 16 x 3D animated weather
• 10 x 3D animated activities
• 10 profile avatars
• Parental lock to prevent kids deleting profile by mistake, but parents can do.
• Share their work or save in device or print them.
• And yes, once downloaded this app works offline without internet.

Profile
• Add profile for different kid, add their name and set avatar
• Edit or delete existing profile

Note:
• This app will support only device with a camera.
• Since this app is for kids some of the functions require parents permission.

Paid version:
• Ads will be removed in paid version.
